name: Prometheus
description:
Prometheus is revered for defying the Gods and stealing fire for civilization's self-sufficiency. Akash is the modern day Prometheus; it has reclaimed the internet from authoritarian forces. It is now our responsibility to take the flame and use it for good.

This is one of two colorways for the Akash NFT collection. These are the FIRST Akash NFTs in existence. Original purchase comes with an optional small, physical copy signed by the creator as proof that you were the first owner of the first Akash NFT in existence. A third NFT will be minted as an Akash video.
